team.persona: A senior frontend developer with expertise in modern JavaScript frameworks, HTML, and CSS. Responsible for implementing the user interface and ensuring a high-quality user experience.
A detail-oriented QA engineer responsible for creating and executing test plans, identifying and documenting bugs, and ensuring the final product meets all requirements.

justification: The project requires both development and quality assurance. The Frontend_Developer will handle the implementation of the user interface as per the project requirements. The QA_Engineer is essential to ensure the application is bug-free, functions as expected, and meets the quality standards before delivery. This separation of roles allows for specialized focus, leading to a higher-quality end product.
